data.eml:eml: Description of two new idiocerine leafhoppers of the genus Chinaocerus (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) from southwestern China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Bin, Chi, Wenfeng, Webb, M. D. (2018): Description of two new idiocerine leafhoppers of the genus Chinaocerus (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) from southwestern China. Zootaxa 4457 (4): 583-588, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4457.4.8
